instruction: Divide a paragraph into five sentences.
input: The use of artificial intelligence is rapidly growing and is having a major impact on many industries, from healthcare to agriculture to business operations.
output: The use of artificial intelligence is rapidly growing. It is having a major impact on many industries, ranging from healthcare to agriculture to business operations. AI is offering new opportunities, improving existing products and processes, and providing solutions to complex problems. It is helping businesses across sectors increase their efficiency and reduce costs. AI is also transforming customer experience, providing highly personalised services.
